query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionStatus ENUM('active', 'canceled', 'past_due', 'inactive') DEFAULT 'inactive',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS plan ENUM('free', 'basic', 'pro') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS monthlyQuota INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS monthlyRendersUsed INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS extraRenders INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS billingPeriodStart TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS billingPeriodEnd TIMESTAMP NULL;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionStatus ENUM('active', 'canceled', 'past_due', 'inactive') DEFAULT 'inactive',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS plan ENUM('free', 'basic', 'pro') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS monthlyQuota INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS monthlyRendersUsed INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS extraRenders INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS billingPeriodStart TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS billingPeriodEnd TIMESTAMP NULL;
